job_details.Functieomschrijving:
Learning workflows and most of the infrastructure. This team is tasked with enabling the success of and synergies between the application teams.
          + Maintain and extend our search back-end.
          + Design, develop, run and evaluate online AB-tests to improve the quality of the search results.
          + Support operational excellence through practices like code review and pair programming
          + The entire team is responsible for the operations of our services. This includes actively monitoring different applications and their infrastructure as well as intervening to solve operational problems whenever they arise.
          + Keep up with developments in the field of Information Retrieval (e.g. semantic search).
          + Build RAG solutions for editorial domain

   Technologies
          + AWS, Kafka, Elasticsearch, Python (FastAPI), SQL, Docker
          + Nice to have: vector databases, semantic search
job_details.full_text:
Software Engineer

Learning workflows and most of the infrastructure. This team is tasked with enabling the success of and synergies between the application teams.
          + Maintain and extend our search back-end.
          + Design, develop, run and evaluate online AB-tests to improve the quality of the search results.
          + Support operational excellence through practices like code review and pair programming
          + The entire team is responsible for the operations of our services. This includes actively monitoring different applications and their infrastructure as well as intervening to solve operational problems whenever they arise.
          + Keep up with developments in the field of Information Retrieval (e.g. semantic search).
          + Build RAG solutions for editorial domain

   Technologies
          + AWS, Kafka, Elasticsearch, Python (FastAPI), SQL, Docker
          + Nice to have: vector databases, semantic search

profile_classification.rationale: The job description emphasizes building RAG solutions and keeping up with developments in semantic search, aligning with generative AI applications. While it includes software engineering and MLOps tasks, the core focus on RAG and semantic search points towards a GenAI Engineer role.

phrases: Maintain and extend our search back-end.
Design, develop, run and evaluate online AB-tests to improve the quality of the search results.
Support operational excellence through practices like code review and pair programming
job_tasks.justification: These phrases describe the development, testing, and maintenance of software systems, including backend services and AB-testing for improving search results, which are core software development activities.

phrases: The entire team is responsible for the operations of our services. This includes actively monitoring different applications and their infrastructure as well as intervening to solve operational problems whenever they arise.
job_tasks.justification: This directly describes the responsibilities of monitoring, maintaining, and troubleshooting services and their infrastructure in a production environment, which is the essence of MLOps.

phrases: Build RAG solutions for editorial domain
Keep up with developments in the field of Information Retrieval (e.g. semantic search).
job_tasks.justification: Building RAG (Retrieval-Augmented Generation) solutions and staying updated on semantic search are directly related to developing and implementing generative AI models and techniques.

phrases: Maintain and extend our search back-end.
job_tasks.justification: Maintaining and extending a search back-end often involves managing data pipelines, indexing, and data structures necessary for search functionality.

phrases: Keep up with developments in the field of Information Retrieval (e.g. semantic search).
Support operational excellence through practices like code review and pair programming
The entire team is responsible for the operations of our services.
intervening to solve operational problems whenever they arise.
